= compgen =

compgen is one of the well-known tab complete tool

== display all variables that matches a word ==

you can display all variables fit with a word by using `-A` option

```bash
$ compgen -A variable BASH
BASH
BASHOPTS
BASHPID
BASH_ALIASES
BASH_ARGC
BASH_ARGV
BASH_CMDS
BASH_COMMAND
BASH_COMPLETION_VERSINFO
BASH_LINENO
BASH_REMATCH
BASH_SOURCE
BASH_SUBSHELL
BASH_VERSINFO
BASH_VERSION
```
